name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John BLUNT, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John BLUNT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Donald G. Joel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Glen S. Gitomer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
364 A.2d 665
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John BLUNT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Nov. 20, 1975.
Decided Oct. 20, 1976.
Donald G. Joel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Glen S. Gitomer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
